# Shiny Apps

## A shiny app example:

The limiting distributions of a t-statistic $Z$ under $H_0$ and $H_1$ can be investigated in the following dynamic plot:

::: {.content-visible when-format="html"}
```{r, echo=FALSE}
if(!knitr:::is_latex_output()){
  knitr::include_app("https://dliebl.shinyapps.io/Gauss-Test-Distr/",
  height = "900px")
}
```
:::

Source: [link](https://github.com/lidom/RM_ES_Script/blob/master/Shiny_Apps/Gauss-Test-Distr/app.R)

Host a shiny app on github: [link](https://shiny.rstudio.com/tutorial/written-tutorial/lesson7/)
